articles.title: 20 years after 9/11, metro Detroit Muslims tired of apologizing, being viewed differently - Detroit Free Press
articles.description: We asked Muslim Americans in metro Detroit, home to the nation's largest Muslim community, to reflect on the 20 years since 9/11.
articles.content:
On 9/11, life changed for Americans.
